𒆠𒁺 ki'tum₂ "bury" ge-tomb kiʳtum₂ kiʳˢtum₂ :

𓈎 𓂋 𓋴 𓌟 𓁀 | bury | curse™ 𒆠𒁺 kiʳtum₂ kiʳˢtum₂ ⇔ christ
